title: Hello
text:
source

say_hello

 say_hello (to)

Say hello to somebody

say_hello('Renoir')

'Hello Renoir!'



from fastcore.test import *


test_eq(say_hello('Claire'), 'Hello Claire!')


from IPython.display import display,SVG


#! export
class HelloSayer:
    'Say hello to `to` using `say_hello`'
    def __init__(self, to): self.to = to
    
    def say(self):
        'Do the saying'
        return say_hello(self.to)


o = HelloSayer('Cindy')
o.say()

'Hello Cindy!'

title: nbdev-hello-world
text:
How to use
You can say hello to someone

say_hello('Hamel')

'Hello Hamel!'
